title: 106_hr773
content: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend through FY 2002 the authorization of appropriations for: (1) the Federal Council on the Aging, (2) administration, (3) grants for State and community programs on aging, (4) the availability of surplus commodities, (5) training, research, and discretionary projects and programs, (6) community service employment for older Americans, (7) grants for Native Americans, (8) allotments for Vulnerable Elder Rights Protection activities, and (9) the Native American program.
